LanguageData.VGE_CrewBunkBed.label: crew bunk bed
LanguageData.VGE_CrewBunkBed.description: A compact double-tiered bed designed for gravship use. Maximizes limited space by allowing two crew members to rest in the footprint of one bed.
LanguageData.VGE_MedbayBed.label: medbay bed
LanguageData.VGE_MedbayBed.description: A specialized gravship bed equipped with an integrated vitals monitor. Designed for medbays, it improves medical outcomes over normal beds. It draws power directly from the grav engine.
LanguageData.VGE_CrewLockers.label: crew lockers
LanguageData.VGE_CrewLockers.description: A set of compact lockers designed for gravship crew quarters. Provides a small comfort bonus to all nearby bunk beds. Placing more than one locker near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipShelf.label: gravship shelf
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipShelf.description: A reinforced storage shelf designed for use aboard gravships. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.VGE_WallFirefoamPopper.label: wall firefoam popper
LanguageData.VGE_WallFirefoamPopper.description: A wall-mounted variant of the firefoam popper. When it detects fire, it bursts and sprays fire-retardant foam in a circular area around itself. Can also be triggered manually.
LanguageData.VGE_CommsTerminal.label: comms terminal
LanguageData.VGE_CommsTerminal.description: A compact version of a comms console that allows radio contact with other factions and orbital traders. It draws power directly from the grav engine.
LanguageData.VGE_WallOrbitalTradeBeacon.label: wall orbital trade beacon
LanguageData.VGE_WallOrbitalTradeBeacon.description: A wall-mounted version of an orbital trade beacon, required for orbital trading. You can only sell goods to orbital traders if they're near an orbital trade beacon. Can be placed indoors.
LanguageData.VGE_FauxPlant.label: faux plant
LanguageData.VGE_FauxPlant.description: An artificial plant in a sturdy metal pot. It requires no light, water, or air, making it perfect for adding beauty to even the most inhospitable gravship environments.
LanguageData.VGE_SealantPopper.label: sealant popper
LanguageData.VGE_SealantPopper.description: When it detects vacuum levels above 25%, this safety device pops and releases a fast-expanding sealant goo. The substance quickly solidifies, sealing gaps and breaches to restore pressure in the room. Can also be triggered manually.
LanguageData.VGE_SealantGoop.label: sealant goop
LanguageData.VGE_SealantGoop.description: A hardened mass of rapidly-expanding polymer foam. Produced by a sealant popper, it forms an airtight plug that seals breaches in gravship rooms exposed to vacuum. While effective at restoring pressure, it is brittle and easy to destroy.
